title: Bonnet Veil, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: machine made bobbin lace
description: Black lace rectangle showing a horizontal repeat of swags enclosing a tall floral form. These motifs are densely filled and outlined with several strands of black silk against an open net ground. Bottom edge and two sides are scalloped.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bonnet Veil, late 19th century.Medium: silk
Technique: machine made bobbin lace. 1977-76-3.
